entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of snow early this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
